page.title: 13PLAYGROUND RHYMES
page.content: On the 1st of the month the following rhyme game is played. "A pinch & a punch the 1st of the month and no returns." Sometimes the reply is "A pinch & a kick for being so quick." These are skipping rhymes.(a) "Green gravel,green gravel,your age is 16. I sent you a letter complaining of the weather.Turn your back you stupid cat. (child turns while skipping) Say no more to me." (b) "Alright-------we saw you kissing------. How many kisses did you give him?" The gaps are for names & the child skips & counts as long as possible.This is an elimination rhyme. The children hit hands in rotation saying "1 potato,2 potato, 3 potato,4. 5 potato,6 potato,7 potato more." The hand touched on the word more is out.A similar rhyme is "Eeeny,meeny,miney,mo out you must go." .
